query:
INSERT INTO taskChecklists (taskId, templateId, stage, status, inspectedBy, inspectedAt, generalComments, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT 
  t.id as taskId,
  ct.id as templateId,
  'in_progress' as stage,
  'failed' as status,
  1 as inspectedBy,
  NOW() as inspectedAt,
  'พบปัญหาหลายจุด - ต้องสร้าง CAR/NCR' as generalComments,
  NOW() as createdAt,
  NOW() as updatedAt
FROM tasks t
CROSS JOIN checklistTemplates ct
LIMIT 1;
